europeana:record.dc:title: Additional remarks on the genus Anepsion Strand, 1929 (Araneae, Argyopidae)
Zoologische Mededelingen
europeana:record.dc:creator: Chrysanthus Fr.
europeana:record.dc:subject: Arthropoda
europeana:record.dc:description: A previous paper on the genus Anepsion (Chrysanthus, 1961) is supplemented with descriptions and/or figures of the following species: A. rhombo√Ødes (L. Koch) $, A. d. depressum (Thorell) $, A. fuscolimbatum (Simon) 9, A. peltoides (Thorell) $, A. hammeni nov. spec. $, A. buchi nov. spec. 9, and A. wolffi nov. spec. 9. A new key to the species is added and, as far as possible, their distribution is indicated on a map.
europeana:record.dcterms:isPartOf: Additional remarks on the genus Anepsion Strand, 1929 (Araneae, Argyopidae) (URN:ISSN:0024-0672) (Volume 44) (Issue 2)
